de.lessvoid.nifty.types

Class NiftyLinearGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.types.NiftyLinearGradient

  • public class NiftyLinearGradient
extends Object
    A linear gradient between with a given angle that contains a number of color stops.
    Author:
    void

      • addColorStop

        public NiftyLinearGradient addColorStop(double stop,
                                        NiftyColor color)
        Add a color stop to the gradient at position stop (value between 0.0 and 1.0) with the given color.
        Parameters:
        stop - a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that represents the position between start and end in a gradient.
        color - a NiftyColor to display at stop position.

      • getAngleInRadiants

        public double getAngleInRadiants()
        Get the angle of the gradient line.
        Returns:
        the angle of the gradient line

      • getColorStops

        public List<NiftyColorStop> getColorStops()
        Returns a List of all existing color stops in this gradient. You'll get a new list so you can't modify the list.
        Returns:
        the existing list of NiftyColorStops

      • setScale

        public NiftyLinearGradient setScale(double scale)
        Apply an optional scale factor to all stops. The default value is 1.0.
        Parameters:
        scale - the new scale factor for the gradient
        Returns:
        this

      • getScale

        public double getScale()
        Get the current scale factor.
        Returns:
        the current scale factor or 1.0 if none have been set.

        Flip the color stops in this gradient around.

      • isFlip

        public boolean isFlip()
        Return true if this gradient should be flipped. Default is false.
        Returns:
        true when this gradient is supposed to be flipped and false if not
